name: image_to_image
prompt: Photorealistic street-level image of vehicles driving or parked on a road in an outdoor environment. Realistic cars, trucks, and busses with accurate proportions and materials. Natural integration with the surrounding environment. Add realistic environmental details such as roadside vegetation, trees, bushes, grass, rocks, or urban elements like sidewalks, curbs, utility poles, street signs, distant buildings or houses. Details should appear naturally placed and consistent with real-world infrastructure. Neutral lighting conditions with realistic shadows, global illumination, and atmospheric depth. Camera perspective, vehicle placement, and road layout should remain unchanged. High realism, real-world photography style, no artistic stylization.
negative_prompt: Cartoon, illustration, CGI, stylized, anime, fantasy, sci-fi. Overly dramatic lighting, cinematic color grading, bloom, lens flare. Unrealistic object shapes, distorted vehicles, warped geometry. Extra vehicles, duplicated objects, missing vehicles. Floating objects, intersecting geometry, broken perspective. Text, logos, watermarks, labels, bounding boxes, overlays. Low resolution, blurry, noisy, pixelated.
